title: Historische Abhandlung von einigen Gottesgelehrten, welche vorher Rechtsgelehrte gewessen sind
language: German, with an epigraph in Latin (from a poem, De obitu Celsi, by Saint Paulinus of Nola; p. 2) and Latin titles of works, and quotations, scattered throughout; at least one quotation in Hebrew (p. 22) and one in Greek (p. 107)
